attributes.additional_details: After my Staffie was attacked whilst he was on his lead by another that was not i was horrified when the owner still did not put his on his lead.ALL breeds of dog should be on leads to prevent this.Dogs have no rights when it is a dog on dog attack.We as responsible dog owners need to protect our dogs.. (we are also on facebook "HELP OUR DOGS") Please sign and together we can HELP OUR DOGS.
